original_text: Joseph went to Pharaoh. He told him, ‘My father and brothers have arrived from Canaan. They have come with their animals and everything that belongs to them. They are now in Goshen.’
korean_text: 요셉이 바로에게 가서 고하여 이르되 내 아버지와 내 형들과 그들의 양과 소와 모든 소유가 가나안 땅에서 와서 고센 땅에 있나이다 하고

sentences.original_text: My father and brothers have arrived from Canaan
They have come with their animals
and everything that belongs to them
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들에게 속한 모든 것과 함께
